attributes.action: More money to people on benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that they should be given a fair chance in life. The children should recieve more and maybe free activities once a month to enjoy as a family. I feel that they don't get enough money to enjoy their life to the full. WHY!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
